Cluster ID:
1) 0x0000: 基本类
2) 0x0006：ON/OFF类
3) 0x0008：Level类
4) 0x0001：电源管理类
5) 0x0406：PIR，人体识别类
6) 0x0402：温度测量类
7) 0x0405：湿度测量类
8) 0x0201: 温控器类

*CLASSIC_JOIN_PERMIT_JOIN:
AA 00 0D 02 04 01 41 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 7B
AA 00 05 82 04 01 41 00 CC 
RSP AA00058204014100CC

新设备入网：
      len   pro   c  ad ep r  |-------MAC-----------| devId
btn:
AA 00 11 82 04 01 45 00 01 00 74 09 E1 7E 33 76 AF 60 00 00 38 
switcher:
AA 00 11 82 04 01 45 01 01 00 3B 9A 01 1A 04 77 DF F8 00 00 C8 
heat:
AA 00 11 82 04 01 45 02 01 00 6F E3 4C E4 00 A0 6F C0 07 01 0E
IND AA0011820401450001007409E17E3376AF60000038 
IND AA0011820401450201006FE34CE400A06FC007010E
aa 00 82 04 01 45 00 01 00 74 09 e1 7e 33 76 af 60 00 00 38 
aa 00 15 90 04 01 00 00 02 00 01 00 00 0a 05 00 42 06 47 37 58 59 50 33 1c 
aa 00 15 90 04 01 00 00 02 00 01 00 00 0a 05 00 42 06 47 37 58 59 50 33 1c 
aa 00 15 90 04 01 00 00 02 00 01 00 00 0a 05 00 42 06 47 37 58 59 50 33 1c 
AA 00 15 90 04 01 00 00 02 00 01 00 00 0A 05 00 42 06 47 37 58 59 50 33 1C

*恢复Gateway到出厂设置：
AA 00 04 02 00 00 00 DB
AA 00 05 82 00 00 00 00 B1 FF FF 
RSP AA00058200000000B1FFFF 


设备Endpoint参数查询[ignore]：
                     ad
btn:
AA 00 05 02 04 01 44 00 1A
AA 00 07 82 04 01 44 00 FF 00 AE 
switcher:
AA 00 05 02 04 01 44 01 1D
AA 00 07 82 04 01 44 01 FF 00 C5 
heat:
AA 00 05 02 04 01 44 02 14
AA 00 07 82 04 01 44 02 FF 00 78 



新设备参数查询[ignore]：
btn:
AA 00 06 02 04 01 45 00 01 4C
AA 00 11 82 04 01 45 00 01 FF 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 FF 
switcher:
AA 00 06 02 04 01 45 01 01 59
AA 00 11 82 04 01 45 01 01 FF 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 6B 
heat:
AA 00 06 02 04 01 45 02 01 66
AA 00 11 82 04 01 45 02 01 FF 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 D0 

*获取设备列表：
AA 00 02 01 10 9D
AA 00 13 81 10 00 07 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 49 
RSP AA00138110000700000000000000000000000000000049  


*获取设备信息：   
         pT    i        |-------MAC-----------| pro      |------name-----| dn devId ep devId ep devId ep
AA 00 04 01 00 00 00 E1

AA 00 1A 81 00 01 00 00 3B 9A 01 1A 04 77 DF F8 04 01 06 51 34 52 48 4E 35 01 00 00 01 19
AA 00 04 01 00 02 00 CB
AA 00 1A 81 00 02 00 00 6F E3 4C E4 00 A0 6F C0 04 01 06 32 43 37 37 32 52 01 07 01 01 21 
AA 00 04 01 00 03 00 DE

sensor类：
      l     pro   clu   m  ad ep devId l  data  t  v
btn pressed:
AA 00 0F 90 04 01 06 00 02 00 05 00 00 04 00 00 10 01 DD 
switcher:
AA 00 0F 90 04 01 06 00 02 01 01 00 00 04 00 00 10 00 EF 
AA 00 0F 90 04 01 06 00 02 01 01 00 00 04 00 00 10 01 E8 
heart:
AA 00 0F 90 04 01 06 04 02 02 01 07 01 04 00 00 18 00 8A 
AA 00 0F 90 04 01 06 04 02 02 01 07 01 04 00 00 18 01 8D 
IND AA000F900401060002000500000400001001DD
IND AA000F9004010604020201070104000018018D

ctrl类：                
      l  pT pro   clu   m  ad rv c
AA 00 09 04 04 01 06 00 02 01 00 00 67
      l     pro   clu   m  ad rv c  r
AA 00 0A 84 04 01 06 00 02 01 00 00 E9 0E 


profile->clu->did->endpoint->mac


std2pri:
profile id
did ---------------- cluster // 脚本中转换
mac ---------------- address // 引擎转换 getAddrFromMac()
endpoint ----------- // ignore


pri2std:
profile id
did ---------------- cluster // 脚本中转换
mac ---------------- getMacFromAddr() // 如果是设备状态通知的情况
endpoint


hello:
